name: express-session-with-placeholder
description: Simple fork of Express session middleware
author: Gabriel Colson (http://github.com/gabrielcolson)

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --check-leaks --no-exit --reporter dot test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --check-leaks --no-exit --reporter spec test/
